verses.verse: Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126> secretly<WH2791> sent<WH7971> two<WH8147> men<WH582> out of Shittim<WH7851> as spies,<WH7270> saying,<WH559> "Go,<WH3212> view<WH7200> the land,<WH776> including Jericho.<WH3405>" They went<WH3212> and came<WH935> into the house<WH802> of a prostitute<WH2181> whose name<WH8034> was Rahab,<WH7343> and slept there.<WH7901>
The king<WH4428> of Jericho<WH3405> was told,<WH559> "Behold,<WH559> men<WH582> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> came<WH935> in here tonight<WH3915> to spy out<WH2658> the land.<WH776>"

The king<WH4428> of Jericho<WH3405> sent<WH7971> to Rahab,<WH7343> saying,<WH559> "Bring out<WH3318> the men<WH582> who have come<WH935> to you,<WH935> who have entered into your house;<WH1004> for they have come<WH935> to spy out<WH2658> all the land.<WH776>"
The woman<WH802> took<WH3947> the two<WH8147> men<WH582> and hid<WH6845> them.<WH559> Then she said, "Yes,<WH582> the men came<WH935> to me,<WH3045> but I didn't know where they came from.<WH370>

It happened about the time of the shutting<WH5462> of the gate,<WH8179> when it was dark,<WH2822> that the men<WH582> went out.<WH3318> Where the men<WH582> went,<WH1980> I don't<WH3045> know. Pursue<WH7291> them<WH310> quickly;<WH4118> for you will overtake them.<WH5381>"
But she had brought them up<WH5927> to the roof,<WH1406> and hid<WH2934> them with the stalks<WH6086> of flax,<WH6593> which she had laid in order<WH6186> on the roof.<WH1406>

The men<WH582> pursued<WH7291> them<WH310> the way<WH1870> to the Jordan<WH3383> to the fords:<WH4569> and as soon as those who pursued<WH7291> them<WH310> had gone out,<WH3318> they shut<WH5462> the gate.<WH8179>
Before they had laid down,<WH7901> she came up<WH5927> to them on the roof;<WH1406>

and she said<WH559> to the men,<WH582> "I know<WH3045> that Yahweh<WH3068> has given<WH5414> you the land,<WH776> and that the fear<WH367> of you has fallen<WH5307> on us,<WH3427> and that all the inhabitants of the land<WH776> melt<WH4127> away before you.<WH6440>

For we have heard<WH8085> how Yahweh<WH3068> dried up<WH3001> the water<WH4325> of the Red<WH5488> Sea<WH3220> before you,<WH6440> when you came out<WH3318> of Egypt;<WH4714> and what you did<WH6213> to the two<WH8147> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> who were beyond<WH5676> the Jordan,<WH3383> to Sihon<WH5511> and to Og,<WH5747> whom you utterly destroyed.<WH2763>

As soon as we had heard<WH8085> it,<WH3824> our hearts melted,<WH4549> neither did there remain<WH6965> any more spirit<WH7307> in any man,<WH376> because<WH6440> of you:<WH3068> for Yahweh your God,<WH430> he is God<WH430> in heaven<WH8064> above,<WH4605> and on earth beneath.<WH776>

Now therefore,<WH7650> please swear to me by Yahweh,<WH3068> since<WH3588> I have dealt<WH6213> kindly<WH2617> with you,<WH6213> that you also will deal kindly<WH2617> with my father<WH1>'s house,<WH1004> and give<WH5414> me a true<WH571> token;<WH226>

and that you will save alive<WH2421> my father,<WH1> my mother,<WH517> my brothers,<WH251> and my sisters,<WH269> and all that they have,<WH5337> and will deliver our lives<WH5315> from death.<WH4194>"

The men<WH582> said<WH559> to her,<WH5315> "Our life for yours,<WH4191> if you don't<WH5046> talk about this business<WH1697> of ours;<WH3068> and it shall be, when Yahweh gives<WH5414> us the land,<WH776> that we will deal<WH6213> kindly<WH2617> and truly with you.<WH571>"
Then she let them down<WH3381> by a cord<WH2256> through<WH1157> the window;<WH2474> for her house<WH1004> was on the side<WH7023> of the wall,<WH2346> and she lived<WH3427> on the wall.<WH2346>

She said<WH559> to them,<WH3212> "Go to the mountain,<WH2022> lest the pursuers<WH7291> find<WH6293> you;<WH2247> and hide yourselves there three<WH7969> days,<WH3117> until the pursuers<WH7291> have returned.<WH7725> Afterward,<WH310> you may go<WH3212> your way.<WH1870>"
The men<WH582> said<WH559> to her,<WH5355> "We will be guiltless of this your oath<WH7621> which you have made us to swear.<WH7650>

Behold,<WH935> when we come into the land,<WH776> you shall bind<WH7194> this line<WH8615> of scarlet<WH8144> thread<WH2339> in the window<WH2474> which<WH3381> you used to let us down.<WH622> You shall gather to yourself into the house<WH1004> your father,<WH1> your mother,<WH517> your brothers,<WH251> and all your father<WH1>'s household.<WH1004>

It shall be that whoever<WH834> goes out<WH3318> of the doors<WH1817> of your house<WH1004> into the street,<WH2351> his blood<WH1818> will be on his head,<WH7218> and we will be guiltless.<WH5355> Whoever is with you in the house,<WH1004> his blood<WH1818> shall be on our head,<WH7218> if any hand is on him.<WH3027>
But if you talk<WH5046> about this business<WH1697> of ours,<WH5355> then we shall be guiltless of your oath<WH7621> which you have made us to swear.<WH7650>"
She said,<WH559> "According to your words,<WH1697> so be it.<WH7971>" She sent them away, and they departed.<WH3212> She tied<WH7194> the scarlet<WH8144> line<WH8615> in the window.<WH2474>

They went,<WH3212> and came<WH935> to the mountain,<WH2022> and stayed<WH3427> there three<WH7969> days,<WH3117> until the pursuers<WH7291> had returned.<WH7725> The pursuers<WH7291> sought<WH1245> them throughout all the way,<WH1870> but didn't<WH4672> find them.

Then the two<WH8147> men<WH582> returned,<WH7725> descended<WH3381> from the mountain,<WH2022> passed over,<WH5674> and came<WH935> to Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun;<WH5126> and they told<WH5608> him all that had happened to them.<WH4672>

They said<WH559> to Joshua,<WH3091> "Truly<WH3588> Yahweh<WH3068> has delivered<WH5414> into our hands<WH3027> all the land.<WH776> Moreover,<WH3427> all the inhabitants of the land<WH776> melt<WH4127> away before us.<WH6440>"
